targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM issues
WHERE 
  issue_type = '$issue_type'
  AND project_key IN ('$project')
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at);

select
  count(*)
from
  issues
where
  status != 'Done'
  and issue_type = '$issue_type'
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
  and project_key = '$project';

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM issues
WHERE 
  status = 'To Do'
  AND issue_type = '$issue_type'
  and project_key = '$project'
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at);

select
  count(*)
from
  issues
where
  status = 'In Progress'
  and issue_type = '$issue_type'
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
  and project_key = '$project';

panels.description: Tickets com mais de 4 dias sem solução

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(*)
FROM
  issues
WHERE
  created_at :: timestamptz < NOW() - INTERVAL '4 days'
  and status not in ('Done')
  and issue_type = '$issue_type'
  AND assignee_email IN ($assignee)
  and project_key = '$project';

panels.title: # Tickets com SLA violado

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM issues
WHERE 
  issue_type = '$issue_type'
  AND project_key IN ('$project')
  AND assignee_email = ''
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at);

SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN assignee_name IS NULL OR assignee_name = '' THEN 'unassignee'
    ELSE assignee_name
  END AS assignee_name,
  COUNT(*) 
FROM issues
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at)
  AND project_key IN ('$project')
  AND (assignee_email IN ($assignee) OR assignee_email IS NULL OR assignee_email = '')
  AND issue_type = '$issue_type'
  AND assignee_email != ''
GROUP BY 1 
ORDER BY 2 DESC;

select
  count(*),
  product
from
  issues
where
  issue_type = 'FP Support'
  AND issue_type = '$issue_type'
  and project_key = '$project'
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)
  group by 2

select
  key,
  summary,
  status,
  assignee_name,
  created_at,
  updated_at
from
  issues
where
  status != 'Done'
  and issue_type = '$issue_type'
  and project_key = '$project'
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at)

panels.description: Média por semana do tempo total entre a criação da issue e sua conclusão.

targets.rawSql:
WITH changelogs AS (
  SELECT
    issue_id,
    MIN(created_at :: timestamptz) AS done_at
  FROM
    issue_changelogs
  WHERE
    to_string = 'Done'
  GROUP BY
    issue_id
),
lead_times AS (
  SELECT
    i.id AS issue_id,
    i.created_at :: timestamptz AS created_at,
    c.done_at,
    EXTRACT(
      EPOCH
      FROM
        c.done_at - i.created_at :: timestamptz
    ) / 3600 AS lead_time_hours
  FROM
    issues i
    JOIN changelogs c ON i.id = c.issue_id
  WHERE
    i.issue_type = '$issue_type'
    AND c.done_at IS NOT NULL
    AND $__timeFilter(c.done_at)
    AND assignee_email IN ($assignee)
    AND project_key = '$project'
)
SELECT
  date_trunc('week', done_at) AS week,
  ROUND(AVG(lead_time_hours), 2) AS avg_lead_time_hours
FROM
  lead_times
GROUP BY
  week
ORDER BY
  week;

panels.title: Lead Time semanal

panels.description: Média do tempo entre o início efetivo do trabalho (ex: quando a issue entra em "In Progress") até a sua conclusão

targets.rawSql:
WITH status_transitions AS (
  SELECT
    issue_id,
    MIN(
      CASE
        WHEN to_string = 'In Progress' THEN created_at :: timestamptz
      END
    ) AS in_progress_at,
    MIN(
      CASE
        WHEN to_string = 'Done' THEN created_at :: timestamptz
      END
    ) AS done_at
  FROM
    issue_changelogs
  GROUP BY
    issue_id
),
cycle_times AS (
  SELECT
    i.id AS issue_id,
    s.in_progress_at,
    s.done_at,
    EXTRACT(
      EPOCH
      FROM
        s.done_at - s.in_progress_at
    ) / 3600 AS cycle_time_hours
  FROM
    issues i
    JOIN status_transitions s ON i.id = s.issue_id
  WHERE
    i.issue_type = '$issue_type'
    AND s.in_progress_at IS NOT NULL
    AND s.done_at IS NOT NULL
    AND $__timeFilter(s.done_at)
    AND assignee_email IN ($assignee)
    AND project_key = '$project'
)
SELECT
  date_trunc('week', done_at) AS week,
  ROUND(AVG(cycle_time_hours), 2) AS avg_cycle_time_hours
FROM
  cycle_times
GROUP BY
  week
ORDER BY
  week;

panels.title: Cycle Time semanal

panels.description: Quantos tickets chegaram em Done por semana

targets.rawSql:
WITH changelogs AS (
  SELECT
    issue_id,
    MIN(created_at :: timestamptz) AS done_at
  FROM
    issue_changelogs
  WHERE
    to_string = 'Done'
  GROUP BY
    issue_id
),
issues_done AS (
  SELECT
    i.id AS issue_id,
    c.done_at
  FROM
    issues i
    JOIN changelogs c ON i.id = c.issue_id
  WHERE
    i.issue_type = '$issue_type'
    AND $__timeFilter(c.done_at)
    AND assignee_email IN ($assignee)
    AND project_key = '$project'
)
SELECT
  date_trunc('week', done_at) AS week,
  COUNT(*) AS throughput
FROM
  issues_done
GROUP BY
  week
ORDER BY
  week;

panels.title: Throughput semanal

panels.description: Quantidade de issues que estavam em andamento (In Progress) em cada semana

targets.rawSql:
WITH status_transitions AS (
  SELECT
    issue_id,
    MIN(CASE WHEN to_string = 'In Progress' THEN created_at::timestamptz END) AS in_progress_at,
    MIN(CASE WHEN to_string = 'Done' THEN created_at::timestamptz END) AS done_at
  FROM issue_changelogs
  GROUP BY issue_id
),
filtered_issues AS (
  SELECT
    i.id AS issue_id,
    s.in_progress_at,
    s.done_at
  FROM issues i
  JOIN status_transitions s ON i.id = s.issue_id
  WHERE i.issue_type = '$issue_type'
    AND s.in_progress_at IS NOT NULL
    AND $__timeFilter(s.in_progress_at)
    AND assignee_email IN ($assignee)
)
SELECT
  date_trunc('week', gs.week) AS week,
  COUNT(*) AS wip_count
FROM filtered_issues i,
  GENERATE_SERIES(
    date_trunc('week', i.in_progress_at),
    COALESCE(date_trunc('week', i.done_at - interval '1 day'), date_trunc('week', now())),
    interval '1 week'
  ) AS gs(week)
WHERE $__timeFilter(gs.week)
GROUP BY week
ORDER BY week;

panels.title: Work In Progress (WIP) semanal

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('day', created_at::timestamp) AS day,
  COUNT(*) AS total_fp_supports
FROM
  issues
WHERE
  issue_type = '$issue_type'
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at::timestamp)
  AND assignee_email IN ($assignee)
  AND project_key = '$project'
GROUP BY
  day
ORDER BY
  day;

SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('day', created_at::timestamp) AS day,
  COUNT(*) AS total_fp_supports
FROM
  issues
WHERE
  issue_type = '$issue_type'
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at::timestamp)
  AND assignee_email IN ($assignee)
  AND project_key = '$project'
GROUP BY
  day
ORDER BY
  day;

SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('day', created_at::timestamp) AS day,
  SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (ORDER BY DATE_TRUNC('day', created_at::timestamp)) AS cumulative_issues
FROM
  issues
WHERE
  issue_type = '$issue_type'
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at::timestamp)
  AND assignee_email IN ($assignee)
  AND project_key = '$project'
GROUP BY
  day
ORDER BY
  day;

SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('day', created_at::timestamp) AS day,
  SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (ORDER BY DATE_TRUNC('day', created_at::timestamp)) AS cumulative_issues
FROM
  issues
WHERE
  issue_type = '$issue_type'
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at::timestamp)
  AND assignee_email IN ($assignee)
  AND project_key = '$project'
GROUP BY
  day
ORDER BY
  day;

SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('week', created_at::timestamp) AS day,
  COUNT(*) AS total_fp_supports
FROM
  issues
WHERE
  issue_type = '$issue_type'
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at::timestamp)
  AND assignee_email IN ($assignee)
  AND project_key = '$project'
GROUP BY
  day
ORDER BY
  day;

SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('week', created_at::timestamp) AS day,
  COUNT(*) AS total_fp_supports
FROM
  issues
WHERE
  issue_type = '$issue_type'
  AND $__timeFilter(created_at::timestamp)
  AND assignee_email IN ($assignee)
  AND project_key = '$project'
GROUP BY
  day
ORDER BY
  day;

list.definition: select distinct assignee_email from issues where project_key = '$project' and assignee_email != '';
list.description: Lista apenas issues para o responsável selecionado
list.label: assignee
list.name: assignee
